title: Wicked Women
description:
Womxn can be smart, brave, compassionate humans, capable of incredible things. But like any human we can be complicated. When the circumstances are perfect, tensions are high, and the supernatural get involved, womxn can be capable of the most wicked things imaginable. In honor of Womxn's month this March, turn off the lights, while I tell you some of their terrible stories.

First, it’s good for the skin 
Followed by killer restraint
Then, hell hath no fury like a witch scorned 
Finally in our featured story, the curse of Medusa

To start your free two-week trial, go to https://www.monday.com/podcast
Listen to Killer Psyche on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or wherever you get your podcasts. You can listen one week early and ad-free by joining Wondery Plus in the Wondery app
Download Best Fiends today for FREE on the App Store or Google Play
Stream you first 30-days of Shudder for FREE at https://shudder,com and use code SOMETHINGSCARY
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
